item.description:
Blues Cafe is bringing in Boston's premier live soul band to Springstep! Get ready to dance the night away to the sounds of your favorite classic soul artists.

This month, we will have a designated Meetup table for those wishing to connect with the people of this group!

The lesson starts at 8:00pm with the lovely Nicole Zuckerman. Cookies and coffee/tea will also be available. Looking forward to seeing you there!

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Blues Cafe Presents The Chicken Slacks
